mdRecord.dcterms:title: Turner Family Cemetery, Locust Grove Dist.
mdRecord.dcterms:description:
Located 2.3 miles past the "End of State Maintenance" sign on Runnet Bag Rd. SE. The road is undriveable most of the year. It is recommended that a 4-wheel drive vehicle be used and a chainsaw be available to clear downed trees. Grave information verified by Myra Adams, a granddaughter of the Turners, July 2021.
N 36 53.753' W 080 12.666'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
Cemeteries
